shapeAction.undo: Step backwards in time one action
shapeAction.paste: Adds the previously-copied shape or shapes into this glyph
shapeAction.addShape: Creates a new default shape and adds it to this glyph
shapeAction.addComponent: Choose another Component or Glyph, and use it as a Component Instance in this glyph
shapeAction.getShape: Choose another Glyph, and copy all the shapes from that glyph to this one

layersPanel.noShapesExist: No shapes exist yet.  You can create one with the New Shape tools on the canvas, or by pressing "add new shape" below.
